data.title: Address by Tunku Abdul Rahman at the proclamation of independence of Malaya (Kuala Lumpur, 31 August 1957)
meta_keywords: address by tunku abdul rahman at the proclamation of independence of malaya (kuala lumpur
data.meta_description: On 31 August 1957, the Malayan Prime Minister Tunku Abdul Rahman gives an address during the festivities held to mark the independence of the Federation of Malaya.
data.text:
Source: ABDUL RAHMAN, Tunku. Text of speech made at the proclamation of independence by Tunku Abdul Rahman. 31-08-1957. Kept in: The National Archives of the UK (TNA). CO - Records of the Colonial Office, Commonwealth and Foreign and Commonwealth Offices, Empire Marketing Board, and related bodies, CO 1030 - Colonial Office and Commonwealth Office: Far Eastern Department and successors. Celebrations on independence of Malaya, CO 1030/845.
